website_summaries.verdict: Overall, the Under Armour Rocket receives positive feedback in terms of the shoe’s exceptional traction, comfortable cushioning, and its upper’s breathability. Although a few feel that the shoe lacked in aesthetics, its performance on court pretty much makes up for it. At only $100 per pair, you are bound to get your money’s worth.
pros: A lot of users say that the UA Rocket feels very comfortable
One even comments that wearing them feels like “walking on air.”
Like the Anta KT 4, several wearers say that these Under Armour basketball shoes do not need any break-in time, adding that you can play in them straight out of the box
Majority of the reviewers agree that the traction of the Rocket is the shoe’s highlight as it performs very well on both clean and dusty indoor courts
One tester even compares it with other basketball shoes such as the Kobe Mentality 2, Kobe 9, or Kyrie 2 that are known for their high-performing outsoles
The materials in the upper are described as lightweight, soft, and breathable
A number of testers say that the shoe feels like the Under Armour Micro G Torch
Due to the Micro G foam used in the shoe’s cushioning, many are happy with the type of impact protection that the Rocket provides
A lot of buyers remark that the Under Armour Rocket and its materials are durable
One shares that after four months of using the shoes, they still feel new
A couple of users think that the Under Armour Rocket is “super stylish,” adding that they love how they can use the basketball sneaker both on and off the court
cons: Most of the wearers notice that the shoe’s outsole attracts dust
however, they agree that it is not to the point where it needs constant wiping
Several players say that the Rocket’s upper is prone to scuffing
It also creases easily at the forefoot
A few testers comment that the cushion feels quite firm despite being Micro G. One reviewer, however, believes that once the midsole gets broken in, the foam will eventually gain its bounciness
Some feel that the UA Rocket’s materials look cheap
Commenters have the same complaint about the Nike PG 3

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking style with good fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look really good and I wore them out my first time without any problems. They are decently comfortable from the start, though I have to say my Adidas Crazy Strike Lows were more comfortable. Performance wise, these UA high tops feel stable and firm, which is good to help protect my ankles. I swapped out the insoles with some Spenco cross trainers, as I do with all my basketball shoes. Size-wise, these UA 9.5s fit just the same as all my Adidas which have always been size 9.5s, so if you're wondering if you should go up or down a half size, if you normally wear Adidas hoop shoes I'd get the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great baskets
customer_reviews.text: These basketball shoes are great! True to size, light weight, perfect for wide feet, very cushioned. My boy wears them 3-4 days a week and they hold up to all the running, jumping and kicking
customer_reviews.author: Cadance

customer_reviews.title: we love UA
customer_reviews.text: well made. Holds up to a 12 yr old boy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin f. fisher

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GOOD LOOKING SHOES!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and have a great grip. The colors are vibrant and they are very good looking. I give it 4 stars because it was hard to get my feet in the shoes because of the design in the back of the shoe. Otherwise they were a great buy and are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan N.

customer_reviews.title: my foot fit just fine. Playing in these has been great so far
customer_reviews.text: When first taking these out of the box, I was worried. I thought I'd need to return them and get a 1/2 size larger. After relacing the shoes, my foot fit just fine. Playing in these has been great so far. The traction is top notch playing in doors, they have a nice bounce, and are very light.
customer_reviews.author: amP

customer_reviews.title: High tops
customer_reviews.text: I luv these shoes, Ive ordered under armours a few times. I find them more comfortable than Nikes and more drable than most.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best basketball shoe I've ever owed. Love the style and was comfortable from the first wear.
customer_reviews.author: Mike E

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and a great price
customer_reviews.text: It is always a gamble for me if shoes are going to fit me right. My left foot is a half size bigger than my right so I always fit to that foot. These shoes fit perfectly and as expected. Very comfortable and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Cowboys Fan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe but my heels start hurting in them after awhile
customer_reviews.author: Damon Patrick Shifflett

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes, Love the hi-top design easy on and off.
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic ankle and feet problems and I am very picky about shoes, Love high tops but hate how difficult it is to squeeze into them, the design of these shoes alleviate that problem and the shoes feel great and reduce my ankle issues. Would buy again!!! My reviews are my opinions of the product received and just my opinion. Everyone is different and could have a different opinion of a product. I do not receive any monetary payment for my reviews, and I always keep them honest. So no need to worry whether or not my review is genuine, because it is. Also if you found this review helpful marking it as so would be greatly appreciated thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Zslayer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, but did not last. This product is not made for real basketball playing.
customer_reviews.author: The Foxes

customer_reviews.title: They look and feel very good. I'll be purchasing another pair soon
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel very good. I'll be purchasing another pair soon.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but kinda smaller than the lable
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price but go with 0.5 size larger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality fits good came in a timely manner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Actually everything is great my so love the shoe and color. Comfortable fit and great ankle support.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a friend and he liked it very much.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit of these shoes could not have asked for a better fit. Quality is outstanding!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected and is comfortable, keeps your foot in place!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are nice, yet we have to return for another pair half size bigger...
customer_reviews.author: duy nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Zero arch support. Bummed about that. I had to get inserts. The construction of the shoe if solid. Rigid design for positive lateral movement and good grip. Overall a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy De Necochea

customer_reviews.title: I actually feel like I can jump higher and make better cuts
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I actually feel like I can jump higher and make better cuts! I am so glad I read the reviews and purchased these. Total winner!

customer_reviews.title: It’s was high quality
customer_reviews.text: The order was very fast and the quality is great. They are easy to break in

product_meta.title: UA Rocket Men’s Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: Hit the court with an extra boost in your step with the Under Armour Rocket. This menâ€s basketball boot is full of little extras that will keep you a step ahead of the competition, including a moulded foam ankle to provide comfort and structure and a full-length Micro G sockliner built to conform to your foot. - Lightweight leather upper with moulded foam ankle to provide comfort and structure - Engineered perfs in forefoot and heel for increased breathability Full-length moulded Micro G sockliner built to mould and conform to your foot - External full-length Micro G foam delivers unmatched lightweight responsiveness - Solid rubber outsole with herringbone traction pattern throughout provides exceptional lateral/linear movement and control - Under Armour branding throughout
feature_bullets: Lightweight leather upper with molded foam ankle to provide comfort & structure
Engineered perfs in forefoot & heel for increased breathability
Full-length molded Micro G sockliner built to mold and conform to your foot
External full-length Micro G foam delivers unmatched lightweight responsiveness
Solid rubber outsole with herringbone traction pattern throughout to provide exceptional lateral/linear movement and control
